segments.text: My eyes are drawn to the little boy, perched so precariously on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s reaching up, way too high for his own good, into the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the “COOKIE JAR” label clearly, filled to the brim with treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool itself looks incredibly unstable; its legs are splayed outward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s actually tilting backward, and I fear he’s going to fall at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got one hand in the jar and the other holding a plate, like a little conspirator.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing nearby, completely focused on him, anticipating a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's got her hand out, ready to catch whatever he manages to grab.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm amazed by their audacity, trying to get cookies right under the woman's nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The potential for a crash and a mess is so high with that wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could end with broken dishes, a crying child, and a very wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They really should be more careful, but hunger must be a powerful motivator.
segments.speaker: PAR
